nodes.text: A clone trooper pilot captain, along with a fellow co-pilot, commanded a Consular-class cruiser during the time of the Clone Wars, a major galactic conflict fought between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

In 22 BBY, the pilot departed from the planet of Rodia with captured Separatist viceroy Nute Gunray, escorted by Jedi General Luminara Unduli and padawan Ahsoka Tano, aboard and attained clearance to land on the Venator-class Star Destroyer Tranquility.
